p: We reported the proteomic profile changes in P. massoniana attributed to Al stress and examined the effect of S. luteus. As a result, we identified 12 core Al responsive proteins differentially expressed between different sets of treatments. Furthermore, we identified 198 specific proteins differentially expressed under SL-inoculated Al stress conditions. Further molecular characterizations of these proteins and their corresponding genes can provide deeper insights into the mechanisms underlying Al-stress resistance in P. massoniana under S. luteus inoculation.
